items.content_html: The argv-utils package is a lightweight library for Node.js that simplifies working with command-line arguments passed to your scripts. It streamlines the process of accessing and managing arguments from process.argv property.
items.title: jesusgraterol/argv-utils: The argv-utils package is a lightweight library for Node.js that simplifies working with command-line arguments passed to your scripts. It streamlines the process of accessing and managing arguments from process.argv property.

items.content_html: Lightweight, modern, grouped javascript toolset

items.content_html: Blocks distracting spotlight overlays on websites to keep you focused. Simple, lightweight, and easy to use.
items.title: tejazmali/spotlight-blocker-extention: Blocks distracting spotlight overlays on websites to keep you focused. Simple, lightweight, and easy to use.

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript utility for generating various types of unique identifiers. This library provides three different ID generation methods, each optimized for specific use cases.
items.title: Its-Satyajit/id-generator: A lightweight TypeScript utility for generating various types of unique identifiers. This library provides three different ID generation methods, each optimized for specific use cases.

items.content_html: A powerful and lightweight inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.
items.title: inversify/monorepo: A powerful and lightweight inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.

items.content_html: Lightweight CSS-in-JS library with high performance written in TypeScript
items.title: frenic/glitz: Lightweight CSS-in-JS library with high performance written in TypeScript

items.content_html: This project is a modern rendition of the classic Pong game, developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Designed to be lightweight and visually appealing, it provides a fun and interactive way to experience the timeless two-player game.
items.title: Joummm/Pong: This project is a modern rendition of the classic Pong game, developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Designed to be lightweight and visually appealing, it provides a fun and interactive way to experience the timeless two-player game.

items.content_html: A lightweight Excel export utility for MudBlazor DataGrid in .NET, enabling simple and efficient spreadsheet generation directly from grid data. Built with OpenXML and JavaScript interop for seamless browser-based file downloads.
items.title: g-s-c-code/DataGridExporter: A lightweight Excel export utility for MudBlazor DataGrid in .NET, enabling simple and efficient spreadsheet generation directly from grid data. Built with OpenXML and JavaScript interop for seamless browser-based file downloads.

items.content_html: A simple React registration form with real-time validation for fields like name, email, phone, DOB, gender, and password. Includes dynamic error feedback, course selection, and skill checkboxes. Fully responsive and ideal for learning React form handling and validation techniques. Lightweight and customizable!
items.title: nahada701/Registraion-form-React: A simple React registration form with real-time validation for fields like name, email, phone, DOB, gender, and password. Includes dynamic error feedback, course selection, and skill checkboxes. Fully responsive and ideal for learning React form handling and validation techniques. Lightweight and customizable!

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript/TypeScript library for working with binary data using C-like structs
items.title: remotex-lab/xStruct: A lightweight JavaScript/TypeScript library for working with binary data using C-like structs

items.content_html: A Telegram Mini App with a growing collection of tools like calculators, converters, and more. All tools are created using advanced Large Language Models (LLMs), ensuring smart and efficient functionality. Lightweight, user-friendly, and regularly updated to simplify everyday tasks directly within Telegram.
items.title: ade1963/tg-mini-tools: A Telegram Mini App with a growing collection of tools like calculators, converters, and more. All tools are created using advanced Large Language Models (LLMs), ensuring smart and efficient functionality. Lightweight, user-friendly, and regularly updated to simplify everyday tasks directly within Telegram.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient WhatsApp bot designed to streamline interactions. Powered by the XSTRO API for core functionality, with Axios ensuring fast performance. Requires only a stable server internet connection.
